Interface EstacionDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
EstacionDAOImpl
public interface EstacionDAO
EstacionDAO interface for managing Estacion objects in a data access layer. It provides methods to retrieve, update, and delete Estacion records.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    actualizar(Estacion estacion)
    Updates an existing Estacion record in the data source.
    void
    eliminar(int posicion)
    Deletes an Estacion record by its position.
    Estacion
    obtener(int posicion)
    Retrieves an Estacion object by its position.
    ArrayList<Estacion>
    obtenerTodos()
    Retrieves all Estacion objects from the data source.

  • Method Details

    • obtener

      Estacion obtener(int posicion)
      Retrieves an Estacion object by its position.
      Parameters:
      posicion - the position of the Estacion

    • obtenerTodos

      ArrayList<Estacion> obtenerTodos()
      Retrieves all Estacion objects from the data source.
      Returns:
      a list of all Estacion objects

    • actualizar

      void actualizar(Estacion estacion)
      Updates an existing Estacion record in the data source.
      Parameters:
      estacion - the Estacion object with updated values

    • eliminar

      void eliminar(int posicion)
      Deletes an Estacion record by its position.
      Parameters:
      posicion - the position of the Estacion to be deleted
